meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

section.name: s2
section.heading: Interpretation
section.def: disclosure request (披露請求) means a request for disclosure of information that is made by the government of a territory outside Hong Kong under any arrangements made with that government and having effect under section 49 of the Ordinance;
relevant arrangements (有關安排), in relation to a disclosure request, means the arrangements under which the request is made;
requesting government (提出請求政府), in relation to a disclosure request, means the government that makes the request.

subsection.leadIn: A disclosure request may be approved only by one of the following persons personally—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the Commissioner;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: any officer of the Inland Revenue Department not below the rank of chief assessor authorized in writing by the Commissioner personally for the purpose, either generally or in any particular case.

subsection.leadIn: The person mentioned in subsection (1)(a) or (b) may approve a disclosure request only if the person is personally satisfied that—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: the provisions of the relevant arrangements that are applicable to the request; and

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: any procedures applicable to the request that may be specified in any instrument that amends or supplements the relevant arrangements; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: unless the Commissioner otherwise permits on reasonable grounds, the request contains the particulars set out in the Schedule.

section.name: s4
section.heading: Information that may be disclosed in response to disclosure request
section.leadIn: The Commissioner must not disclose any information in response to a disclosure request unless the Commissioner is satisfied that the information relates to— (9 of 2013 s. 8)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the carrying out of the provisions of the relevant arrangements in respect of any period that starts after the arrangements have come into operation; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the administration or enforcement of the tax law of the requesting government’s territory in respect of any period that starts after the relevant arrangements have come into operation.

part.name: P3
part.heading: Provisions Relating to Information to be Disclosed

subsection.leadIn: Subject to subsection (5), the Commissioner must, before any information is disclosed in response to a disclosure request, by a notice in writing given to the person who is the subject of the request—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: notify the person of the nature of the information requested; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: notify the person that the person may request a copy of the information that the Commissioner is prepared to disclose to the requesting government.

subsection.content: A request under subsection (1)(b) must be made, by a notice in writing given to the Commissioner, within 14 days after the notice under subsection (1) is given to the person.

subsection.leadIn: If a person makes a request in accordance with subsection (2), the Commissioner must, within a reasonable time, by a notice in writing given to the person—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: provide the person with a copy of the information that the Commissioner is prepared to disclose to the requesting government; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: notify the person that the person may request the Commissioner to amend the information or any part of the information on any of the following grounds—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: the information or that part of the information does not relate to the person;

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: the information or that part of the information is factually incorrect.

subsection.leadIn: A request under subsection (3)(b)—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: must be made, by a notice in writing given to the Commissioner, within 21 days after the notice under subsection (3) is given to the person;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: must specify the manner in which the person requests the information to be amended, and the grounds for the request; and

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: must be accompanied by any documentary evidence that the person wishes to put forward in support of the request.

subsection.leadIn: The Commissioner is not required to notify a person who is the subject of a disclosure request in accordance with subsection (1) if the Commissioner has reasonable grounds to believe that—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: all the addresses of the person known to the Commissioner are inadequate for the purpose of giving the notification;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the notification is likely to undermine the chance of success of the investigation in relation to which the request is made; or

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.leadIn: the Commissioner is under a tight time constraint to disclose the information in response to the request, such that—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: it is not practicable for the notification to be given, and the subsequent requests that the person may make in relation to the information to be finally determined under these Rules, within the time constraint; and

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: the failure of the Commissioner in disclosing the information to the requesting government within the time constraint is likely to frustrate the efforts of the requesting government in enforcing the tax laws of its territory.

section.name: s6
section.heading: Request to Commissioner for amendments to information to be disclosed

subsection.content: If a person makes a request in accordance with section 5(4), the Commissioner must decide whether to fully approve, partially approve or refuse the person’s request.

subsection.leadIn: If the Commissioner fully approves the person’s request, the Commissioner must, within a reasonable time, by a notice in writing given to the person—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: notify the person that the Commissioner has fully approved the request and has amended the information to be disclosed to the requesting government in the manner requested; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: provide the person with a copy of the information that has been so amended.

subsection.leadIn: If the Commissioner partially approves the person’s request, the Commissioner must, within a reasonable time, by a notice in writing given to the person—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: notify the person that the Commissioner has partially approved the request and has amended part of the information to be disclosed to the requesting government in the manner requested;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: provide the person with a copy of the information that has been so amended; and

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: give reasons why the Commissioner has only partially approved the request.

subsection.leadIn: If the Commissioner refuses the person’s request, the Commissioner must, within a reasonable time, by a notice in writing given to the person—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: notify the person that the Commissioner has refused the request; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: give reasons for the refusal.

section.name: s7
section.heading: Request to Financial Secretary for directions relating to information to be disclosed

subsection.content: If a person is notified under section 6(3) or (4) of the Commissioner’s refusal to amend the information or any part of the information that the Commissioner is prepared to disclose in response to a disclosure request, the person may request the Financial Secretary to direct the Commissioner to make the amendments.

subsection.leadIn: A request for a direction under subsection (1)—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: must be made, by a notice in writing given to the Financial Secretary, within 14 days after the Commissioner’s notice is given to the person;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: must specify the manner in which the person requests the information to be amended, and the grounds for the request; and

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: a copy of the Commissioner’s notice; and

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: any documentary evidence that the person wishes to put forward in support of the request.

subsection.leadIn: If a person makes a request in accordance with subsection (2), the Financial Secretary—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: may require the Commissioner to disclose to the Financial Secretary any information relating to the person in the Commissioner’s possession, custody or control that the Financial Secretary considers to be relevant for the purpose of determining the person’s request; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: must decide whether to fully approve, partially approve or refuse the person’s request.

subsection.leadIn: If the Financial Secretary fully approves the person’s request, the Financial Secretary must—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: amend the information to be disclosed to the requesting government in the manner requested; and

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: provide the person with a copy of the information that has been so amended; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: within a reasonable time, by a notice in writing given to the person, notify the person that the Financial Secretary has fully approved the request and has given the direction mentioned in paragraph (a).

subsection.leadIn: If the Financial Secretary partially approves the person’s request, the Financial Secretary must—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: amend part of the information to be disclosed to the requesting government in the manner requested; and

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: provide the person with a copy of the information that has been so amended; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: within a reasonable time, by a notice in writing given to the person—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: notify the person that the Financial Secretary has partially approved the request and has given the direction mentioned in paragraph (a); and

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: give reasons why the Financial Secretary has only partially approved the request.

subsection.leadIn: If the Financial Secretary refuses the person’s request, the Financial Secretary must, within a reasonable time, by a notice in writing given to the person—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: notify the person that the Financial Secretary has refused the request; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: give reasons for the refusal.

subsection.content: The Financial Secretary’s decision made under this section is final.

part.name: P4
part.heading: Provisions Relating to Information that has been Disclosed

subsection.leadIn: If the Commissioner is not required to notify a person who is the subject of a disclosure request under section 5(1) for the reason given in section 5(5)(c), the Commissioner must, at the time when information is disclosed in response to the request, by a notice in writing given to the person—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: notify the person of the nature of the information requested; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: notify the person that the person may request a copy of the information that the Commissioner has disclosed to the requesting government.

subsection.content: A request under subsection (1)(b) must be made, by a notice in writing given to the Commissioner, within 14 days after the notice under subsection (1) is given to the person.

subsection.leadIn: If a person makes a request in accordance with subsection (2), the Commissioner must, within a reasonable time, by a notice in writing given to the person—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: provide the person with a copy of the information that the Commissioner has disclosed to the requesting government; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: notify the person that the person may request the Commissioner to amend the information or any part of the information on any of the following grounds—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: the information or that part of the information does not relate to the person;

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: the information or that part of the information is factually incorrect.

subsection.leadIn: A request under subsection (3)(b)—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: must be made, by a notice in writing given to the Commissioner, within 21 days after the notice under subsection (3) is given to the person;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: must specify the manner in which the person requests the information to be amended, and the grounds for the request; and

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: must be accompanied by any documentary evidence that the person wishes to put forward in support of the request.

section.name: s9
section.heading: Request to Commissioner for amendments to information that has been disclosed

subsection.content: If a person makes a request in accordance with section 8(4), the Commissioner must decide whether to fully approve, partially approve or refuse the person’s request.

subsection.leadIn: If the Commissioner fully approves the person’s request, the Commissioner must, within a reasonable time, by a notice in writing given to the person—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: notify the person that the Commissioner has fully approved the request and has amended the information in the manner requested; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: provide the person with a copy of the information that has been so amended.

subsection.leadIn: If the Commissioner partially approves the person’s request, the Commissioner must, within a reasonable time, by a notice in writing given to the person—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: notify the person that the Commissioner has partially approved the request and has amended part of the information in the manner requested;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: provide the person with a copy of the information that has been so amended; and

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: give reasons why the Commissioner has only partially approved the request.

subsection.leadIn: If the Commissioner refuses the person’s request, the Commissioner must, within a reasonable time, by a notice in writing given to the person—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: notify the person that the Commissioner has refused the request; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: give reasons for the refusal.

subsection.content: The Commissioner must, within a reasonable time, disclose any information that has been amended as mentioned in subsection (2) or (3) to the requesting government.

section.name: s10
section.heading: Request to Financial Secretary for directions relating to information that has been disclosed

subsection.content: If a person is notified under section 9(3) or (4) of the Commissioner’s refusal to amend the information or any part of the information that the Commissioner has disclosed in response to a disclosure request, the person may request the Financial Secretary to direct the Commissioner to make the amendments.

subsection.leadIn: A request for a direction under subsection (1)—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: must be made, by a notice in writing given to the Financial Secretary, within 14 days after the Commissioner’s notice is given to the person;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: must specify the manner in which the person requests the information to be amended, and the grounds for the request; and

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: a copy of the Commissioner’s notice; and

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: any documentary evidence that the person wishes to put forward in support of the request.

paragraph.name: a

paragraph.content: must decide whether to fully approve, partially approve or refuse the person’s request.

subsection.text: If the Financial Secretary fully approves the person’s request, the Financial Secretary must—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: amend the information that has been disclosed to the requesting government in the manner requested; and

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: provide the person with a copy of the information that has been so amended; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: within a reasonable time, by a notice in writing given to the person, notify the person that the Financial Secretary has fully approved the request and has given the direction mentioned in paragraph (a).

subsection.leadIn: If the Financial Secretary partially approves the person’s request, the Financial Secretary must—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: amend part of the information that has been disclosed to the requesting government in the manner requested; and

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: provide the person with a copy of the information that has been so amended; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: within a reasonable time, by a notice in writing given to the person—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: notify the person that the Financial Secretary has partially approved the request and has given the direction mentioned in paragraph (a); and

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: give reasons why the Financial Secretary has only partially approved the request.

subsection.leadIn: If the Financial Secretary refuses the person’s request, the Financial Secretary must, within a reasonable time, by a notice in writing given to the person—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: notify the person that the Financial Secretary has refused the request; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: give reasons for the refusal.

subsection.content: The Financial Secretary’s decision made under this section is final.
The Commissioner must, within a reasonable time, disclose any information that has been amended as directed under subsection (4)(a)(i) or (5)(a)(i) to the requesting government.

section.name: s11
section.heading: Manner of giving notice to Commissioner or Financial Secretary

subsection.content: Any notice required to be given to the Commissioner under these Rules may be given by sending the notice by post, or delivering it, to the Commissioner.
Any notice required to be given to the Financial Secretary under these Rules may be given by sending the notice by post, or delivering it, to the Financial Secretary.

schedule.name: sch0
schedule.heading: Particulars to be Contained in Disclosure Request

section.name: s1
section.content: The identity of the person or authority that makes the disclosure request (competent authority).

section.name: s2
section.content: The purpose of the disclosure request and the tax type concerned.

section.name: s3
section.content: The identity of the person who is the subject of the disclosure request.

section.name: s4
section.leadIn: A statement on the information requested, including—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the nature of the information;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the relevance of the information to the purpose of the disclosure request; and

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: the form in which the competent authority wishes to receive the information from the Commissioner.

section.name: s5
section.content: The ground for believing that the information requested is held by the Commissioner or is in the possession or control of a person in Hong Kong. (9 of 2013 s. 9)

section.name: s6
section.content: The name and address of any person believed to have possession or control of the information requested. (9 of 2013 s. 9)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the disclosure request complies with the laws and administrative practices of the requesting government’s territory;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the competent authority is able to obtain the information under the laws of the requesting government’s territory or in the normal course of the administrative practices of the requesting government’s territory; and

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: the disclosure request complies with the relevant arrangements.

section.name: s8
section.content: A statement that the requesting government has pursued all means available in its territory to obtain the information, including getting the information directly from the person who is the subject of the disclosure request.

section.name: s9
section.content: The tax period for which information is requested.

section.name: s10
section.content: The period within which the competent authority wishes the disclosure request to be met.

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: confirming that the competent authority is of the opinion that notification to the person who is the subject of the disclosure request is likely to undermine the chance of success of the investigation in relation to which the request is made; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: giving reasons for the opinion.

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: confirming that the competent authority is of the opinion that prior notification to the person who is the subject of the disclosure request is likely to frustrate the timely enforcement of the tax laws of the requesting government’s territory; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: giving reasons for the opinion.
